entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
